title: Monocacy National Battlefield: Collections
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Collections              Collections       Monocacy National Battlefield manages a wealth of objects and information in its museum, archives and library collection.   These collections are used to prepare exhibits and interpretive programs. Researchers may request an appointment to use some of the parkâ€™s collections. Please be certain to call in advance to schedule an appointment as approval is based upon availability of staff to supervise researchers.
